home.unsub_description: After leaving the subscription, you will no longer receive group messages. Are you sure to cancel the subscription?

invitation_public.empty_hint: There are currently no active members providing invitation codes.
invitation_public.title: Public invitation codes
invitation_public.welcome_desc: Show you the invitation codes of recently active group members. It is recommended that you contact the other party before use. If there is a problem, it is also convenient to seek help from the other party.

invitations.gen_post_without_code_hint: Generate a poster, send it to your friends or post it to social network to invite your friends to join the group.
invitations.title: Invitations

invitations_share.general_share_summary: Join the group and be together
invitations_share.title: Share

kyc.hint_init_line_1: To continue to use this service, please perform the verification. Please make the following preparations:
kyc.hint_init_line_3: 2. Make sure the camera and microphone permissions are turned on
kyc.hint_pending_line_1: The audit is conducted by a third party and may take 15 minutes to complete.
kyc.hint_pending_line_2: After the review is completed, you will receive a notification.
kyc.notice_line_1: Currently, only mainland residents are supported to complete verification.
kyc.notice_line_2: Verification requires access to the phone camera and microphone. Make sure that these two permissions are turned on.
kyc.notice_line_3: Verification is done by third-party services (such as FaceID), and your personal information is only used for verification.
kyc.notice_line_4: Your personal information will be encrypted and properly processed, and we will not disclose or sell your personal information to other third parties.
kyc.notice_line_5: 如果你使用锤子或者坚果手机，建议截屏实名验证的二维码，然后插上电源线，在支付宝或者微信中扫码进行实名验证。
kyc.qrcode_text: If you can not complete the verification, please scan the QrCode to try again.
kyc.qrcode_text_alt: 如果你使用锤子或者坚果手机，建议插上电源线，在支付宝中扫码进行实名验证。
kyc.title: Verification

me_page.coupon_description: View all coupons of groups and products

me_page.title: Hi {name}

member.block_hint: Block them to prevent them sending messages in the group
member.title: Member Info

onboarding_guide.sec_text_1: {name} is a private group, you can join this group according to the guide. Speaking in the group, please abide by the group rules, and abide by local policies and regulations.
onboarding_guide.sec_text_2: This group requires an invitation code to join. If you do not have an invitation code, please ask your inviter for it.
onboarding_guide.sec_text_3: This group needs to pay a certain amount to join. Please select a payment method and you can join the group after payment.
onboarding_guide.title: Join the group

onboarding_install.step_text_1_2: Download XUEXI App from App Store / Google Play
onboarding_install.step_text_1_3: for Chinese users, please download XUEXI App Apk and install manually
onboarding_install.step_text_1_4: Download APK (Please open the link in browser)
onboarding_install.step_text_2_4: Tap `Add contacts`, and tap the bot button at the left top corner.
onboarding_install.step_text_2_6: Use the invitation code to join {name}
onboarding_install.step_text_2_7: You will see the welcome message. You may need to pay if it's a private group.
onboarding_install.title: A Guideline to Join

onboarding_welcome.sec_text_1: The group supports the course replay. All the courses in the group can be watched and replayed through this entry.
onboarding_welcome.sec_text_2: Sending some cryptocurrencies to the group, and all group members can receive it.
onboarding_welcome.sec_text_3: Sending Kudos to others and a color kudos message will be showed in the group.
onboarding_welcome.summary: Please speak in a friendly manner in the group, abide by national policies and group rules, and do not exchange illegal content and conduct personal attacks in the group. The following is a brief introduction to the group functions.
onboarding_welcome.title: Welcome

pay.invite_desc: Please ask your inviter for the invitation code, or tap here to view the codes provided by the group members.
pay.method_crypto_desc: You neet to pay some coins to join this private group.
pay.paid_confirm_dialog_text: If you have already paid, please click PAID. It may take us 3 to 5 minutes to process your order.
pay.title: Join the Group
pay.welcome_desc: It's a private group, please follow the instructions to join it. The payment is non-refundable.
pay.welcome_desc_alt: It's a public group, tap the button to join
pay.xuexi_payment_desc: You neet to pay at XUE XI to join this private group.

profit.hint_distribute: The profit is settled once a month. After deducting income tax, the bonus will be distributed to your wallet on the 1st of the following month.
profit.hint_kyc_required: You need to complete the KYC before we can distribute the reward to your wallet.
profit.title: Profit

qr.scan_hint: Scan with Mixin Messenger or Fox.ONE

renew.paid_confirm_dialog_text: If you have already paid, please click PAID. It may take us 3 to 5 minutes to process your order.
renew.title: Renewal
renew.welcome_desc: Each renewal will extend the group membership, and you can extend the period by renewal multiple times. Renewal is non-refundable.

stream.download_hint: Download Mixin Messenger to join the group chat
stream.title: Stream
stream.websocket_error_hint: Failed to connect to chat server
